p: To identify the sand fly species constitutive of the Drin virus positive pool, barcoding PCR was performed with 3 Î¼L of nucleic acid to amplify partial regions of the cytochrome c oxidase I ( COI) and cytochrome b ( Cytb) genes, respectively, as previously described [ 21, 22]. The PCR products were purified and sequenced through NGS. The reads were compared with available sequences in the GenBank sequence database using CLC Genomic Workbench 11 software (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany).
